Sentencas: An electrophorefic deposition (EPD) method was applied for the preparation of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) thin film on a NiO-YSZ porous anode substrate for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ film by EPD and its application in SOFCs

Sentencas: Dense YSZ film with uniform thickness can be readily prepared with the EPD method using isopropanol as solvent and iodine as dispersant.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ film by EPD and its application in SOFCs

Sentencas: As EPD electrode, the NiO-YSZ substrate was covered with a graphite layer to obtain enough electric conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ film by EPD and its application in SOFCs

Sentencas: A series of experiments, such as suspension concentration, sintering shrinkage, and so on, were conducted in order to optimize the EPD technique.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ film by EPD and its application in SOFCs

Sentencas: A planar-type SOFC was fabricated using La0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF) as the cathode and YSZ film deposited onto the NiO-YSZ anode substrate as the electrolyte.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ film by EPD and its application in SOFCs

Sentencas: The fuel cell exhibited an open circuit voltage of about 1.0 V and a maximum power density of 440 mW/cm(2) at 900 degrees C. Thus, the EPD method was a suitable technology for the formation of gas-tight YSZ film.
Titulo: Preparation of YSZ film by EPD and its application in SOFCs
